name: DIGIKA
description: DGK Token was born from a bold ambition: revolutionizing freelancing and digital payments through blockchain. By leveraging secure smart contracts, decentralized governance, and a robust economic ecosystem, DGK offers a fast, transparent, and reliable solution for freelancers and businesses worldwide. In today’s gig economy and remote work landscape, traditional platforms impose high fees, slow payments, and a lack of transparency. DGK Token eliminates these barriers with a decentralized, secure, and fair model—empowering all stakeholders. The future of freelancing starts now.
